structure.unit: ARTICLE XLIX. MIAMI-DADE COUNTY INDIGENT HEALTH CARE TASK FORCE

text.section:
Sec. 2-523. Organization of the task force.
The members of the task force shall elect a chairperson and other such officers as may be deemed necessary or desirable, who shall serve at the will of the task force.
A majority of members of the task force shall constitute a quorum necessary to hold a meeting and take any action. A majority vote of the members present shall be necessary to take any action. The chairperson may call meetings of the task force. Meetings may also be called by written notice signed by six (6) members. The task force at any meeting may fix and call a meeting on a future date. Minutes shall be kept of all meetings of the task force and all meetings shall be public. The County Manager, County Attorney and Clerk of the County Commission shall provide appropriate staff support.
The task force may appoint committees to accomplish its tasks, and may include as committee members individuals who are not task force members.
